Description:
Looking For The Perfect Family Home?
Dont miss this opportunity to embrace the family lifestyle youve been craving! Showcasing stylish interiors, a sun-drenched alfresco deck and backyard vehicle access, this home is simply irresistible!
Positioned in a family-friendly pocket of Leopold, this location will leave you wanting nothing. A short stroll will find you at the Bellarine Rail Trail or Hoddle Drive Playground, where you can enjoy some outdoor family fun. Public transport is within easy walking distance, while both Leopold Sportsmans Club and the Gateway Plaza are close by. Easy access to Leopold Primary School, Leopold Community Hub and the Leopold Library will delight families. To top it all off, the Portarlington Highway grants access to the Geelong CBD and Bellarine Peninsula.
Showcasing contemporary style, the interiors exude a calming ambience throughout the home. With both the lounge and open plan living zone capturing the northern light, an enticing setting is created for everyday living. The lounge provides the perfect spot to relax or can even be set up as the ultimate kids retreat. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone flows onto the backyard and alfresco deck via glass stacker doors. Complete with a built-in bench, youll love that you can kick back on the deck with friends as the kids play in the secure backyard. The picture-perfect kitchen will impress with stone benchtops, a walk-in pantry, and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas cooktop, rangehood).
Zoned to the front of the home, the dreamy Master Bedroom features a walk-in robe and en suite with large shower, dual vanity and toilet. Three additional bedrooms boast built-in robes. The main bathroom, laundry with external access, and separate toilet complete the layout. Ducted heating and a split-system air conditioner keep you comfortable in all seasons. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, while secure side vehicle access provides additional vehicle storage perfect for caravans, boats or trailers!
With the elements in place for fine family living, youll need to act quickly to avoid disappointment!

Description:
Fantastic Family Lifestyle
Less than five years old, this residence ticks every box for superb family living! The spacious outdoor entertaining area will delight, while secure side vehicle access is a huge plus. This property also presents an ideal opportunity for eligible first homebuyers to secure the First Home Owners Grant.
With both the Bellarine Rail Trail and Hoddle Drive Playground within easy walking distance, the whole family will be enticed to venture outdoors. The Leopold Sportsmans Club is also close by, while the Gateway Plaza will leave you wanting nothing. Young families are taken great care of with easy access to kindergartens and Leopold Primary School. Public transport is moments away, while the Portarlington Highway keeps you connected to Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula.
With the interiors in immaculate condition, every inch of this home feels just like new. The central lounge inspires relaxation, while the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone is bathed in an abundance of natural light. The open plan living zone opens onto both the backyard and covered outdoor entertaining area, which sets the scene for many casual barbeques and lively gatherings with loved ones. The kitchen showcases stone benchtops, a built-in pantry and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, oven, gas cooktop, rangehood).
Overlooking the front garden, the generous Master Bedroom is graced with a walk-in robe and en suite. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the main bathroom and separate toilet. The laundry is complete with storage and external access. Ducted heating and two split-system air conditioners keep you in the utmost comfort. Lined with easy care gardens, the generous backyard creates a secure play space for children and pets alike. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, while a side gate provides secure vehicle access to the backyard.

Description:
An Ideal Setting Matched By A Flawless Location
The picture-perfect presentation of this alluring family home will immediately strike a chord amongst those searching for a quality home in a fashionable family setting. Modern in design and situated in an iconic family-friendly location thats within walking distance to walking tracks, bike trails as well as a short drive to some of the best surf coast beaches in the country!
With modern finishes throughout the home demonstrates style and sophistication with its up-to-date design. An inviting environment offering three spacious bedrooms that all include built in robes, a large main bedroom with a convenient ensuite. The large open plan kitchen, dining and living area will be the talking point amongst buyers, starting with the stylish kitchen offering quality bench tops, stainless steal appliances, ample storage space, large pantry and dishwasher. Flowing on from the kitchen is a spacious dinning area that offers easy access to its own outdoor entertaining space while the family living area is neighboring. The remaining bedrooms are positioned at the rear of the home serviced by the family bathroom that includes shower, bath and vanity while a separate toilet and laundry is located adjacent.
Ducted gas heating throughout, split system air-conditioning and north facing aspects capture plenty of natural flowing light throughout which completes the inside of this family abode.
All situated on a great corner allotment of 458m2 (approx.), quietly positioned under this Leopold address but still close to all the action. Primary and secondary schools, public transport and the Geelong Ring Road are all only moments away.
Take advantage of the peaceful surroundings, simply move in, relax and dont worry about a thing.

Description:
A RARE OPPORTUNITY KNOCKS!
A rare opportunity has presented itself for those looking to downsize their home but still enjoy the benefits of approx 585 m2 parcel of land in the coastal town of Clifton Springs. Features of the home include ducted heating, split system air conditioning for year round comfort and 2 bedrooms with a central bathroom/en-suite to both! The expansive open plan living, dining and kitchen area enjoy duel access to both the rear yard and side access to the house large enough for a car if a little tweaking was done. Positioned within walking distance to both the Golf Club and Clifton Springs waterfront, this really is the ideal choice for those looking to downsize without having to compromise on space and privacy. Call for an inspection today!

Description:
Coastal, Chic & Contemporary
Completely renovated throughout, this modern delight has left no stone unturned and allows for you to move right in, with nothing to do but sit back and enjoy!
Raked timber ceilings and inviting hardwood timber floors sets the scene for this light and bright abode. The practical and spacious kitchen offers SS appliances and an abundance of storage, while overlooking the dining and lounge. 3 sundrenched bedrooms all with built-in-robes sit from the central hallway and are serviced by the family bathroom with shower, bath and vanity, separate toilet and all complete with a clever European laundry.
Sliding doors from the dining space gives access to the undercover deck and pergola, which flows onto a lush grass area, surrounded by mature and established foliage.
Additional features include heating and cooling, new window furnishings and light fittings, subtle Bay views, garden shed, double carport set upon a generous 585m2 parcel.
A sublime first home, ideal investment or perfect for those downsizing who don't want to compromise on space, this home will exceed your expectations. With public transport, shops and the Bay at your fingertips, flanked for choice when it comes to amenities including schools, cafes and the Geelong CBD only a 20-minute drive away, this is the perfect lifestyle choice!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
DELIGHTFUL HOME WITH MODERN APPEAL
This wonderful home has been updated with modern appeal and is positioned in a court location with adjacent laneway access to Jetty Rd. The home enjoys both space and privacy on approx 755m2 and is situated in close proximity to the Clifton Springs boat ramp, bowls and golf clubs & the pristine swimming beach at The Dell. Well maintained and featuring 3 bedrooms including master with ensuite, a functional kitchen with adjoining dining & sitting room that flow out to an undercover entertaining area and a spacious separate lounge overlooking the lush front garden. The generous rear yard is ideal for those needing extra space. The home further enjoys a split system, ceiling fans, quality blinds and represents a fantastic opportunity with investment potential or a fabulous place to call home!

Description:
Ultimate Lifestyle Opportunity on the Bellarine
The Feel:
Murradoc Lodge is one of the Bellarines most exclusive lifestyle properties, with breathtaking views over rolling hills to Bass Strait. Set on over 11 acres (approx) with black cracking soil, fenced paddocks & equine facilities, vantage points can be enjoyed from various parts of this amazing property across Corio Bay to Geelong, the You Yangs & Queenscliff. Superbly updated with a quintessential country feel, this 4-bed home has multiple living areas, a showpiece Provincial style kitchen, solar-heated pool & covered entertaining area in a sunny, private position.
The Facts:
INDOORS:
-Fully renovated homestead, set on 11 Acres (approx.) 5 mins from Drysdale village
-Commanding hilltop position with unrestricted views of Bass Strait & beyond to the Surf Coast
-Vantage points w/ views to Geelong, You Yangs & Queenscliff
-Family-friendly floorplan provides well-zoned options for children or possible B&B potential
-Traditional character meets Provincial style for a quintessential country feel
-Wide X-Brace verandas wrap the north & west elevations, offering restful, contemplative spaces
-Large formal living space overlooks the north-facing pool & farm boundary
-High ceilings with large picture & bay windows invite resplendent views inside
-Countryside views framed by large timber windows in the OP kitchen, dining & living zones
-Chefs kitchen with Tasmanian Oak cabinetry, Provincial display cabinet, all new light fittings
-Extensive black granite breakfast bar w/ induction cooktop & DW
-Large walk-through Butlers Pantry, 900mm s/s Technika f/s gas cooker
-Velux Skylight floods the home with abundant daylight
-Tranquil master suite includes SSAC, WIR & Bay views through picture windows
-Luxurious en-suite showcases Bass Strait by day & the constellations by night
-You Yangs & Bay views from north-facing queen-size bedroom
-Large laundry with durable stainless-steel benches & powder room
-Commodious eastern bedroom wing is the perfect teenage retreat (excellent B&B potential)
-Queen sized bedrooms open on to covered veranda with spectacular views
-Spacious rumpus/TV room with SSAC affords children/guests their own space
-Central bathroom & WC with Corian vanity, bath & embossed herringbone tiling
-Electric home heating, 4 x SSACs & open fireplace creates a central hub in main living
-Remote DLUG with internal access
OUTDOORS:
-Cypress-lined driveway, accessed by automatic gates, leads to distinctive Murradoc Lodge
-Solar-heated, salt-chlorinated pool & covered entertaining area in sunny, private position
-2 fenced yards & 4 paddocks, as well as huge raised garden beds for a self-sufficient lifestyle
-Large shed with high clearance for toys' & caravans, plus additional utility shed & pergola
-Secure stables at the other end of the shed & 20x50m arena for equine enthusiasts
-Total of 90,000L(approx) rainwater storage for drinking & home use that never runs low
-32,500L shed roof water harvesting for stock, with autofill systems for paddock troughs
-Beautiful Kikuyu lawns + black cracking soil w/ fruiting trees, blue gums, Moreton Bays & Magnolia
-Just 5 minutes to every family convenience in Drysdale, & the Bellarine's best schools
-10 minutes to surf & bay beaches, wineries & the Portarlington ferry to Docklands
This premium location strikes the perfect balance of a peaceful country lifestyle, with all the convenience required for a modern family.
**PLEASE NOTE** This property is accessed via Drakes Road, not Whitcombes Road. The entry to the property is located on the corner of Drakes Road and Founds Road, Drysdale.
The Owner Loves.
This house is big enough to host any occasion, we have had the whole family here for Christmas and celebrations, & entertaining flows easily out to the pool or covered veranda. There are so many places to sit, both inside & out, to take in the glorious views.
*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the information that is passed on. Description:
Breathtaking Water Views
This striking residence is beautifully positioned to embrace the ultimate 'sea change' lifestyle; commanding panoramic water views, a short stroll to the water's edge, the highly regarded boat launch literally just down the road and the Clifton Springs Golf Course only a 5 iron from your front door. A stylish renovation showcases light filled living zones of grand proportions and all the modern comforts one could wish for! A genuine one of a kind and a truly exclusive offering!
4 bedrooms; master is complete with ensuite and walk in robe. All 3 additional bedrooms have built in robes
The primary living zone of this home is a fine example of 'reverse living' to optimise spectacular panoramic vistas; sweeping water views through the towering tree tops and the impressive granite peaks of the You Yangs. A trio of glass sliding doors lead out onto the wrap around deck and promote an abundance of natural light.
The kitchen is beautifully appointed; expansive bench tops, custom cabinetry, excellent storage solutions and Smeg appliances.
A 2nd independent living zone provides further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan.
The prime landing of approximately 613m² is enviably placed right within the blue chip Golf Course precinct.
All the modern comforts and a stylish renovation provide a wonderful buying opportunity
The Bellarine Peninsula offers a wonderful seaside lifestyle; award winning wineries, vibrant restaurant and café scene and so many more wonderful features to be discovered.

Description:
Make It Yours!
Here is a wonderful opportunity to purchase the site for your new home, wonderfully close to Clifton Springs Primary School, making it ideal for raising your children. If they want to play tennis or skate we have the playground close by as well. The boat ramp and golf course are within 1 km of this block, giving you a wealth of leisure time opportunities at your doorstep. This block is flat, with a slight elevation at the front. Offering limited water views in the distance, here is the perfect opportunity to build (STCA) your dream family home.
Terms: 10% Deposit. Settlement 60 Days Or Sooner By Agreement.
Text 20carapooka to 0472 880 610 for further details.

Description:
CENTRAL DRYSDALE, WALK EVERYWHERE! NOTHING TO DO.
In the middle of the village with all amenities at your doorstep, medical, shops, parks, library and cafes. This home has so much to offer, generous proportions in all rooms , large lounge room , well designed kitchen with adjacent dining and sliding doors opening to outside alfresco area. Two bedrooms , both with BIR'S, central bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. Features include walk in pantry, split system, gas heater and fan. Matured gardens to delight the new owner, so easy to relax. Single garage with direct access to home and enough room for some storage. Description:
Ideal Low Maintenance First Home or Investment!
Fresh to the market is this low maintenance and neatly presented three bedroom property that is close to it all in Leopold. Shops, supermarkets, sporting facilities, schools and parks are all located around the corner.
Guests are greeted with a large, water feature in the front yard, which sets the tone for this house where nothing is overlooked. Upon entrance is the master suite with built-in robes, en suite and white shutters for extra privacy. Two other double bedrooms with robes are serviced by a shared bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
The open-plan central hub allows for ample light and space to dine and entertain. A u-shaped kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, breakfast bar and corner pantry. From here there are sliding doors to an undercover, outdoor entertaining and barbeque area with a built-in sink, bar and cupboard.
The backyard is well-groomed with raised garden beds, tool shed and greenhouse. There is also a double lock-up garage with shelving and workbenches, extra off-street parking, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, security system and water tank plumbed for garden irrigation.
Ideal for a first-home, lock and leave weekender or investment - either way it wont be available for long!

Description:
Moving up in the World!
Private Inspections Available!
Dont miss this opportunity to embrace easy living in Leopold! Whether youre a family, first homebuyer, or investor, this home is an absolute gem!
With both Leopold Primary School and Allanvale Pre-school less than 400 metres from your front door, this location is ideal for young families. Public transport is also a short stroll away, along with the Leopold Community Hub and Leopold Library. The Dorothy Street shops are within easy walking distance for all of your daily needs. Easy access to the Gateway Plaza, local sporting grounds, and Bellarine Rail Trail adds the final touch to this family-friendly locale.
The interiors exude a hint of retro character, with large windows capturing the surrounding gardens and natural light. The open plan dining/kitchen zone flows through to the living room, which provides an enticing setting all year round. The open fireplace creates a cosy ambience during the cooler months, while summer will inspire you to open the glass doors onto the balcony. Capturing glimpses of the bay, youll love kicking back on the balcony and soaking up the sunshine. The kitchen features a built-in pantry, dishwasher, and 900mm stainless steel cooking appliances (oven, gas cooktop, canopy rangehood). The sitting area creates a private nook that is perfect for curling up with your favourite book.
All three bedrooms feature built-in robes, while the bathroom is complete with a single vanity and combined shower/bath. The separate toilet and laundry with external access complete the floorplan. An air conditioner provides additional comfort. Outside, established trees create privacy in the secure yard. The double carport provides off-street parking. The opportunity exists to build a second story to capture stunning views of Geelong and the Bay! (STCA).
Presenting easy living in a Leopold hotspot, youll need to act swiftly to avoid disappointment! Enquire today!

Description:
You Can Relax. Weve Found It For You
Located in the heart of Leopold, this low maintenance home is an opportunity for you to secure quality real estate in a highly sought-after area. Located within an easy stroll of Leopold Primary, the ever-expanding Gateway Plaza, and Leopold sporting facilities, youll definitely appreciate the convenience of this location.
This neatly presented, brick veneer home offers three generous sized bedrooms, main with walk-in robe and full ensuite, while remaining two bedrooms include built-in robes and share access to the central bathroom and separate toilet.
An open plan living arrangement with floorboards throughout and a functional kitchen creates the hub of the home. The kitchen offers built-in wall oven, gas cooktop, dual drawer dishwasher, and ample cupboard and bench space. A washed in natural morning sunlight it creates a comfort to the home, while also including a split system heating & cooling.
Outdoors offers two options, an undercover BBQ alfresco area perfect for entertaining, or a beautiful deck overlooking the neighborhood and the low maintenance gardens below.
Added features include; garden shed for extra storage, double car garage with drive-through vehicle access & water tank.
This inviting property is neat as a pin from front to back and will feel like home the moment you walk through the door. An inspection is sure to impress!

Description:
This Could Be the One...
This property has been tastefully updated and offers comfortable living for the first home buyer, young family, downsized, or an opportunity to secure the perfect investment property. The instant comfort and appeal of this home, complemented by its superbly central location, will ensure this residence is a talking point amongst buyers.
This brilliantly designed home comprises of three good-sized bedrooms, all offering built-in robes, plus private ensuite in the main bedroom, while remaining bedrooms utilise the main central bathroom and separate toilet.
The convenient layout incorporates two separate living zones, a fully updated and contemporary designed kitchen, and dining area, all creating the hub of the home. The kitchen includes stone top benchtops, new stainless-steel appliances, dishwasher, cooktop, built-in oven, stylish black tapware, feature lighting, and an abundance of storage space.
Outside offers ample space for the whole family. A paved pergola area, perfect for entertaining family and friends, a garden shed for extra storage with access via double gates, and a single remote garage/ workshop.
Added extras include; split system heating/ cooling, gas wall heater, ceiling fan, near new carpet & window furnishings.
Set on a generous allotment of 638m2 approx., this home simply caters for everyone! Freshly painted inside and new timber laminate flooring throughout is sure to please. This is a solid home, which is ideally located within a few minutes walk of shops, schools, and close to transport. Dont miss out on this one!

Address: 51 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Opulent Golf Course Frontage
Offering total peace and tranquility, this magnificent home captures the beautiful Clifton Springs water views and is perfectly set up for Golf on the weekends and the complete lifestyle balance.
With water view from the front and expansive yard to the rear - inspection is certain to inspire and impress.
This three bedroom family residence offers superior comfort and is elegantly themed, featuring an open plan kitchen/meals/family/living zone boasting expansive views and large windows that create light filled rooms.
The kitchen is the true centrepiece of the home. With dropped feature ceiling, an oversized island bench and a feature 5 drop pendant light above. The induction cooktop, dishwasher and large built in pantry will ensure that you love using this space.
There are also three large bedrooms, all have built in robes. The second toilet in the laundry is a convenient addition.
There are dual driveways on either side of the property. On the ground floor there is a drive in man cave (with remote controlled roller door) or separate family rumpus room with easy access to the expansive back yard with a good sized garden shed.
Welcome extras include home security and alarm system, evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating, full frontage balcony and established gardens.
This standout property is central to all the lifestyle and amenities from the heart of Clifton Springs. This property is about life's moments. Walk across the road for a game of golf or a lovely dinner for two at Clifton Springs Golf club. Utilise the bowls club just down the road or simply enjoy the ambience along the waterfront.
You are able to view this property 7 days a week by private inspection. We have created an environment to look and purchase safely. Please contact us to arrange a time to do so.
Internal area
17m²

Description:
Buy For the View
Loved family home on the market for the first time in over 30 years. Dual access with front & back steps lead you up to the elevated living offering bay views that will never be built out. Open plan light filled living features panoramic views of the bay showcasing Avalon, You Yangs & Geelong watching ships cruise through the channel. Lounge is tiled & has a reverse cycle split system. Kitchen has plenty of cupboards & an electric stove. Sliding doors out to study with built in desk. Split level leads you to the Master bedroom that has carpet, 4 built in robes & sliding doors out to the balcony. Bedroom 2 has carpet, 2 built in robes. Bed 3 is smaller & tiled with sliding doors out to the balcony, versatile as a either sitting room or kids play zone. Also here is the central bathroom servicing all rooms. Excellent use of under the house! Here you will find a huge 2nd living area perfect for a teenager, 4th bedroom, entertainment room or even a holiday let. Also here is a separate toilet and a laundry complete with a shower & double linen. Plus, a storage room for beach gear or bikes. The backyard offers low maintenance gardens, neighbor be gone hedges, side gate direct to the double carport, a double car lock up garage, off street parking for 2 cars & low maintenance gardens with more side gates. All on a 580m2 block just waiting for the new owner. All amenities you could need including local schools, shopping centres, cafes, public transport & medical facilities. Plus, everything the Bellarine lifestyle has to offer such as the bay, boat ramps, beaches, ferry services & wineries just to mention a few.

Description:
Calling all First Home Buyers, Downsizers or Savy Investors
This modern newly built 4 Bed, 2 Bath DLUG home set high on 400m2 in old Leopold would suit an array of buyers.
Comprising of a large Master bedroom located at the front of the home offering stylish double dressed blinds, handy WIR and spacious ensuite with shower, toilet and heatlamps for those chilly mornings.
Down the hall you will find an oversized 4th bedroom with BIR or ideal second living room with double doors. This room would make for an ideal toy room, home office or teenage retreat large enough for bed & a study desk.
The main open plan kitchen / dining / living is drenched in natural light and is equipped with stone features, 4 burner gas cooktop, modern splashback, dishwasher and ample cupboard space.
Towards the rear of the home you will find a further two good sized double bedrooms both with BIR and a modern central bathroom to service the whole family. This bathroom offers a full size bath, shower, heat lamps and an additional seperate toilet.
Outside you will find a low maintenance L shaped rear yard with raised garden beds, plus a new hardy plank back deck which flows beautifully off the large living room, making it an ideal entertaining space for Summer BBQ's.
This near new home is ideally located in popular old leopold, mins drive to Leopold shopping complex, 10 mins to Geelong CBD and less than 20 minutes to popular Bellarine.

This is an opportunity not to be missed!

Description:
Solid Home With Significant Garage & Carports!
A unique opportunity in this prized Leopold location exist to acquire a solid three bedroom home with significant carport and garage space, one of the most impressive I have seen at this price and on a residential 650m2 (approx.) allotment! Blink and it may be a long wait until you find another property quite like this one. The home comprises of a spacious living area, open kitchen with new wall oven and large dining area. The three bedrooms are a sizeable and offer built-in robes and central family bathroom with the main bedroom offering a walk-in robe and ensuite. Evaporative cooling and gas heating provide comfort. There is an open garage, carport and large rear garage (enough space for at least 10 cars under roof!) that needs to be inspected to be fully appreciated and the sizing of these spaces can be found on the floor plan provided. Other features include a powder room to garage and alfresco with BBQ. Truly a unique opportunity not to be missed!

Description:
Entry Level Buying with Sweeping Bay Views!
Bayside charm meets coastal chic - this completely renovated home is a sheer delight and all within a 5 minute stroll to the water's edge.
Positioned perfectly within an enviable, elevated pocket of Clifton Springs, this is a rare opportunity to secure entry level buying, with million-dollar views!
Oozing neutral, earthy tones throughout, you're welcomed by a spacious open plan living, dining and fully equipped kitchen with gas cooking, dishwasher, ample storage and marble look benchtops, with this whole area encompassing tranquil Bay views. 3 generous sized bedrooms all sit from the rear hallway, with the master comprising access to the outdoor deck - a tranquil retreat indeed, overlooking the Bay and Beacon Point Reserve! A central family bathroom offers a combined bath and shower, vanity and floor to ceiling tiles, with the laundry hosting an additional shower.
The backyard offers an open deck and grassed area, ready for you to add your creative touches.
Additional features include - Stainless steel appliances, ducted heating, central cooling, single car port, garden shed.
Beacon Point Reserve, the Bay and public transport are quite literally on your doorstep, with all major amenities and the remainder of the Bellarine only minutes away. This is a lifestyle choice that you will not regret, whether you're looking for your first home, next investment or holiday home.

Description:
Quiet Court Location on 817sqm
The Feel:
Looking for a family home with extra space & the security of a court location? Look no further than this impeccably presented 3-bedroom home, with dual living, study, well-appointed kitchen & a huge backyard with room to extend in future. Ideally positioned between the CBD & the coast, this residence enjoys a private position with the Bellarine Rail Trail directly behind your fence for regular walks or rides. Delivering on quality & practicality, it provides easy, low maintenance living.
The Facts:
-3BR family home set on a substantial 817sqm allotment
-Neatly presented & privately tucked away at the end of Melissa Crt
-Natural light filled open plan living, meals & kitchen
-S/S apps include: Westinghouse electric oven, gas hob & Bosch dishwasher
-Direct access to outdoor entertaining area
-Neutral tones including quality tiled flooring, & carpets in bedrooms/formal living room
-Master bedroom with WIR & en suite (shower, vanity, WC)
-Zoned minor BRs with BIRs, family bathroom (bath/shower/vanity/sep WC) & laundry
-Study/home office located at front entry adjacent to Master
-Enviable storage throughout
-Ducted heating/evaporative cooling + ceiling fans
-Sealed driveway & paths with established plants & screen trees
-3,400L of rainwater storage + 3x3m garden shed
-Potential for extension in future with sunny orientation (STCA)
-Monitored security system
-OSP & DLUG, plus rear yard access to store a trailer/boat/caravan
-Pedestrian walkway to bordering Bellarine Rail Trail for daily family walks & rides
-A few short minutes by car to school, sporting clubs & Gateway Plaza shops
-10mins to Geelong CBD & 15mins to beach & cafes in Ocean Grove
The Owner Loves.
We love the quiet court position & its such a friendly neighbourhood... its central to everything a family needs & only a few minutes to the Gateway Plaza Shopping Centre, schools & sporting clubs.
